rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: According to the agency, bird flu was found in Fauquier County, Virginia; and in Fulton County, Kentucky, on Feb. 12, in non-poultry birds and commercial broiler chickens, respectively.
